title: LVPruning: An Effective yet Simple Language-Guided Vision Token Pruning Approach for Multi-modal Large Language Models
details: Y Sun, Y Xin, H Li, J Sun, C Lin, R Batista-Navarro - arXiv preprint arXiv:2501.13652, 2025
abstract: Multi-modal Large Language Models (MLLMs) have achieved remarkable success by integrating visual and textual modalities. However, they incur significant computational overhead due to the large number of vision tokens processed, limiting …
